---
id: random-place
title: "Retrieve a Random Place"
description: "Returns a randomly selected place from the database along with all its associated geographical and administrative data. Useful for testing or displaying sample location data."
sidebar_label: "Retrieve a Random Place"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"
info_path: docs/api/api-reference-postcodes-io
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Retrieve a Random Place"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/random/places"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a randomly selected place from the database along with all its associated geographical and administrative data. Useful for testing or displaying sample location data.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successfully retrieved a random place","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Place Response","type":"object","required":["status","result"],"properties":{"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","enum":[200]},"result":{"type":"object","title":"Place","description":"A geographical location with detailed information including names, coordinates, and administrative boundaries","required":["code","name_1","name_1_lang","name_2","name_2_lang","local_type","outcode","county_unitary","county_unitary_type","district_borough","region","country","longitude","latitude","eastings","northings","min_eastings","min_northings","max_eastings","max_northings"],"properties":{"code":{"title":"Code","type":"string","description":"Unique identifier for the place record (persistent except for Section of Named/Numbered Roads)","example":"osgb4000000074559833"},"name_1":{"title":"Primary Name","type":"string","description":"Official name of the place (preserves original format, e.g., \"The Pennines\" not \"Pennines, The\")","example":"Y Trallwng"},"name_1_lang":{"title":"Primary Name Language","type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Language code for name_1 (cym=Welsh, eng=English, gla=Scottish Gaelic)","example":"cym"},"name_2":{"title":"Secondary Name","type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Alternative name in a different language","example":"Welshpool"},"name_2_lang":{"title":"Secondary Name Language","type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Language code for name_2 (cym=Welsh, eng=English, gla=Scottish Gaelic)","example":"eng"},"local_type":{"title":"Local Type","type":"string","description":"Ordnance Survey classification (City, Town, Village, Hamlet, etc.)","example":"Hamlet"},"outcode":{"title":"Outcode","type":"string","description":"Postcode district (first part of the postcode)","example":"BH24"},"county_unitary":{"title":"Administrative Area","type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"County, Unitary Authority or Greater London Authority that contains this place","example":"Powys - Powys"},"county_unitary_type":{"title":"Administrative Area Type","type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Type of administrative unit (e.g., County, UnitaryAuthority)","example":"UnitaryAuthority"},"district_borough":{"title":"District or Borough","type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"District, Metropolitan District or London Borough containing this place","example":"null"},"district_borough_type":{"title":"Borough Type","type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Type of district/borough administrative unit","example":"null"},"region":{"title":"Region","type":"string","description":"European Region (formerly Government Office Region) containing this place","example":"Wales"},"country":{"title":"Country","type":"string","description":"Country within Great Britain (England, Scotland, or Wales)","example":"Wales"},"longitude":{"title":"Longitude","type":"number","format":"double","description":"WGS84 longitude coordinate","example":"-3.14971194307843"},"latitude":{"title":"Latitude","type":"number","format":"double","description":"WGS84 latitude coordinate","example":"52.6606391732959"},"eastings":{"title":"Eastings","type":"integer","description":"Ordnance Survey grid reference Easting (1m resolution, not available for Channel Islands/Isle of Man)","example":"322335"},"northings":{"title":"Northings","type":"integer","description":"Ordnance Survey grid reference Northing (1m resolution, not available for Channel Islands/Isle of Man)","example":"307611"},"min_eastings":{"title":"Minimum Eastings","type":"integer","description":"Western edge of the place's bounding box (Minimum Bounding Rectangle)","example":"321623"},"min_northings":{"title":"Minimum Northings","type":"integer","description":"Southern edge of the place's bounding box (Minimum Bounding Rectangle)","example":"306458"},"max_eastings":{"title":"Maximum Eastings","type":"integer","description":"Eastern edge of the place's bounding box (Minimum Bounding Rectangle)","example":"323592"},"max_northings":{"title":"Maximum Northings","type":"integer","description":"Northern edge of the place's bounding box (Minimum Bounding Rectangle)","example":"308740"}}}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
